thread.title: Joe Franklin pulls 7-1 upset in Belmont feature
thread.title_full: Joe Franklin pulls 7-1 upset in Belmont feature - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Joe Franklin pulls 7-1 upset in Belmont feature
text:
Done NEW YORK (AP) -- Joe Franklin was the 7-1 upset winner of the $90,000 allowance feature for turf sprinters on Thursday at Belmont Park.
Jose Ortiz guided the 3-year-old to a second straight win, and the fifth in 10 career starts.
The colt, trained by David Jacobson, set the pace for the six furlongs in 1:07.87 over the firm course. He paid $16.60, $8.90 and $5.10.
Iroquois Girl, the lone mare in the field, finished 1 1/2 lengths behind the winner, returning $5 and $4.
Night Officer paid $3.60 to show.
Dowse's Beach finished sixth as the 8/5 favorite.
Sports & Recreation Joe Franklin Belmont Park   24622/79545   3897/10000   1560/4772
